actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to stipulate that arrangements made by the Secretary of Transportation to protect laborers and mechanics employed by contractors or subcontractors in the performance of construction work financed under such Act shall not include a requirement for approval of collective-bargaining agreements other than by appropriate local employee representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.
